code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function TradingBotPanel(){const[botActive,setBotActive]=useState(false);const[logs,setLogs]=useState([]);const toggleBot=()=>{const status=!botActive;setBotActive(status);const message=status?'ðŸ¤– Bot started trading...':'â›” Bot stopped.';setLogs(prev=>[...prev,message]);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{marginTop:'2em',padding:'1em',border:'1px solid #ccc',borderRadius:'6px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"\uD83E\uDDE0 Trading Bot Panel"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:toggleBot,style:{padding:'10px 20px',backgroundColor:botActive?'#e74c3c':'#2ecc71',color:'#fff',border:'none',borderRadius:'4px',cursor:'pointer',marginBottom:'1em'},children:botActive?'Stop Bot':'Start Bot'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:"\uD83D\uDCDC Bot Logs:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:logs.map((log,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:log},idx))})]})]});}export default TradingBotPanel;
